hadiths.text: It was narrated from 'Awn bin Abi Juhaifah that his father said:"I saw the Prophet (ﷺ) in Al-Batha'. Bilal brought out the water left over from his Wudu' and the people rushed toward it and I got some of it. Then a short spear was planted in the ground and he led the people in prayer, while donkeys, dogs and women were passing in front of him

chapter.eng-name: Using Water Left Over From Wudu'
